docs.lead_paragraph: Rebuffing Gov. Rick Scott, a Florida Senate committee proposed using federal money to enroll low-income residents in private insurance as a compromise.

headline.seo: Florida Senate Committee Rejects Medicaid Expansion
headline.main: Medicaid Expansion Is Rejected in Florida
headline.print_headline: Medicaid Expansion Is Rejected In Florida

docs.abstract: Florida Senate committee rebuffs Gov Rick Scott's support of Medicaid expansion, rejecting idea and all but ending possibility that state will add more poor people to program; proposes compromise of accepting federal money but using it to put low income people into private insurance plans.
docs.snippet: Rebuffing Gov. Rick Scott, a Florida Senate committee proposed using federal money to enroll low-income residents in private insurance as a compromise.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Christine Jordan Sexton contributed reporting from Tallahassee, Fla.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials see an opening to argue for cuts in bases and health and weapons programs that have long been in President Obama’s sights.

headline.seo: Mandatory Cuts Could Open Path to Deeper Defense Trims
headline.main: Cuts Give Obama Path to Create Leaner Military
headline.print_headline: Cuts Give Obama Path to Create Leaner Military

docs.abstract: Anxious Pentagon officials who are facing $46 billion in mandatory budget cuts see opening to argue for deep reductions in military bases, healthcare and weapons programs that have long been in Pres Obama's sights; some say reductions, if done smartly, could easily exceed those mandated by sequestration and leave room for areas where more money will be required.
docs.snippet: Officials see an opening to argue for cuts in bases and health and weapons programs that have long been in President Obama’s sights.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and THOM SHANKER

docs.lead_paragraph: Yasuko Yokoshi, as the first artist to participate in the New York Live Arts resident commissioned artist program, will present her new piece, “Bell.”

headline.seo: Yasuko Yokoshi’s ‘Bell’ at New York Live Arts

docs.abstract: Choreographer Yasuko Yokoshi will debut her dance piece Bell at New York Live Arts; performance is first one to come from New York Live Arts' resident commissioned artist program, which was designed to nurture creative innovation in mid-career artists.
docs.snippet: Yasuko Yokoshi, as the first artist to participate in the New York Live Arts resident commissioned artist program, will present her new piece, “Bell.”

docs.lead_paragraph: A world-renowned physicist meets a gorgeous model online. They plan their perfect life together. But first, she asks, would he be so kind as to deliver a special package to her?

headline.main: The Professor, the Bikini Model and the Suitcase Full of Trouble

docs.abstract: Maxine Swann article describes how world-renowned physicist Paul Frampton's meeting of supposed bikini model Denise Milani online got him arrested for drug smuggling in Buenos Aires.
docs.snippet: A world-renowned physicist meets a gorgeous model online. They plan their perfect life together. But first, she asks, would he be so kind as to deliver a special package to her?

docs.lead_paragraph: The play “Lucky Guy,” Nora Ephron’s last completed work, is about a journalist who kept striving to do his best work even as he was dying of cancer. He was her inspiration to do the same.

headline.print_headline: How My Mother Planned to Outwork Death

docs.abstract: Jacob Bernstein article on his mother Nora Ephron's last completed work, play Lucky Guy, about journalist Mike McAlary; notes McAlary kept striving to do work even as he was dying of cancer, inspiring Ephron to do the same.
docs.snippet: The play “Lucky Guy,” Nora Ephron’s last completed work, is about a journalist who kept striving to do his best work even as he was dying of cancer. He was her inspiration to do the same.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan, head of the United States’ most prominent Catholic diocese, is juggling his leadership roles, Vatican tasks and numerous interviews on Italian television.

headline.seo: Cardinal Dolan, Pope Material or Not, Gains Notice in Rome
headline.main: Pope Material or Not, a Charming, Cheerful Cardinal Gains Notice in Rome
headline.print_headline: Pope Material or Not, a Charming, Cheerful Cardinal Gains Notice in Rome

docs.abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan, archbishop of New York, attracts attention in Rome as he juggles his leadership roles, Vatican tasks and numerous interviews on Italian television.
docs.snippet: Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan, head of the United States’ most prominent Catholic diocese, is juggling his leadership roles, Vatican tasks and numerous interviews on Italian television.

byline.contributor: Rachel Donadio and Daniel J. Wakin contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Having a baby is a wonderfully happy time and also a stressful one, so it pays to get your financial house in order for the sake of you, your partner and your new child.

headline.seo: Your Money: Financial and Legal Advice for Expectant Parents
headline.main: For Parents-to-Be, a Few Financial and Legal Tips
headline.print_headline: For Parents-to-Be, a Few Financial and Legal Tips

docs.abstract: Tara Siegel Bernard Your Money column holds that while having a baby is a wonderfully happy time, it is also a stressful one, so it pays for new parents to get their finances in order before the baby is born.
docs.snippet: Having a baby is a wonderfully happy time and also a stressful one, so it pays to get your financial house in order for the sake of you, your partner and your new child.

headline.main: Wunderman, Big WPP Agency, Gets a Major Makeover

docs.abstract: Wunderman, one of the largest agencies inside the WPP agency holding company empire, is being overhauled to better respond to the significant shifts in how marketers are seeking to reach consumers.
docs.snippet: Wunderman, one of the largest agencies inside the WPP agency holding company empire, is being overhauled to better respond to the significant shifts in how marketers are seeking to reach consumers.
